PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-05421998-03-310,  ,  ,  CITIZENSHIP, 
PrecisRe-appointment of WILLIAM JACKSON, of Ottawa, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Convention Refugee Determination Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour, for a term of three years; and designation of WILLIAM JACKSON as a coordinating member of the Convention Refugee Determination Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), effective April 15, 1998.
